name: Holy Nightmare Co. Tumblr Edits
description:
Did you ever want tumblr to be themed after the Holy Nightmare Corporation from the Kirby anime? No? Oh well. This style still exists.

Posts --> Empire
Likes --> Nightmares
Following --> Pawns
Followers --> Demons
Spotlight --> Find Planets
Drafts --> Plans
Queue --> Next Creations
Customize --> Corruption
Activity --> Power
Members --> Salesmen
